version_description:
- 5 NEW exciting JIGSAW PUZZLES!
- 5 NEW yummy food items!
- Bugfixes and improvements! App is BETTER and works FASTER!
- Check out Ginger's NEW Website and Toys by pressing the i button!

5 NEW AMAZING PUZZLES – See the story of the surprising kite trip with Talking Ginger and Talking Tom!

5 NEW DELICIOUS FOODS – Talking Ginger can now feast on five new delicious foods. Find out which ones!

NEW NAME & NEW ICON - We changed the name of the app and the icon as well.
NEW VIDEO GALLERY - Watching videos will be a lot more enjoyable now.
BUG FIXES: We fixed iOS 8 related issues.
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.
